__e: That's what the kids on the estate called me.
You know what the kids used to call me in school?
I guess they call them the good old days for a reason.
But you agreed to leave if they didn't call the cops?
They called someone every few hours after that. I got the sense that it was him.
It's, like, most of them have, like, five of everything, so they'd never call the police.
Last year a tall kid got killed.
They called it "the backside." For the Beast, do you think?
Some years later, that handsome young man who they called "The King,"
Only my mother and my nurse ever called me by it and that was over 40 years ago.
Aye, and many are dead now who called you by it.
Why they called it that, I don't know.
A man so hard, he was once called The Rock.
Anne... How easy do you think it was for me to find a proper husband, when I was called the great prostitute!
I'll show you. You remember when France was called the eldest daughter of the church?
I don't care what they call me... as long as they don't call me what they did at school.
"Bones..." that's funny, that's what... all my friends called me back at college.
Every time my parents called, that was actually me.
